subject: RE: [junit] Logging tests reports
msgSnippet: You could simply redirect the output of the TextRunner into a file, so it seems to me. Regards, Ilja ... From: Eric Heikkila [mailto:ericheikkila@yahoo.com]
messageBody:
You could simply redirect the output of the TextRunner into a file, so it seems to me.
 
Regards, Ilja
-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Heikkila [mailto:ericheikkila@...]
Sent: Freitag, 29. März 2002 14:20
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] Logging tests reports

I don't believe it does, but it'd be easy enough to do
by throwing in some Log3J code.

-Eric

--- Luis Joaquim <ljoaquim@...>
wrote:
